text: I had very pleasant experience here to remove my wisdom tooth today. Dr Florence is very professional and friendly, and the casual chat with her fully eased my anxiety before we start the procedure. The whole process was fast and smooth, and I‚Äôm not feeling painful at all. Also want to say thanks the staffs I met today receptionist Laura and nurse Diyannah for their kind assistances and patient explanations. Will definitely revisit here in future!

I had wisdom tooth extraction surgery at NoFrills Dental with Dr. Florence. She is the most caring dentist I've ever been to.  They took the time to listen to my concerns and made sure I was comfortable throughout my appointment.  The whole staff at nofrills is incredibly kind and professional especially nurse  diyannah and receptionist Laura who helping Dr Florence. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a positive dental experience.
Excellent dentist! Dr Florence is friendly, caring and really takes great care of my daughter's teeth. Highly Recommended üëç

My first visit to Dr Marcel Fung was a great experience. The work done very competently and I'm really happy with the results.

The staff were extremely courteous and Mr Fung attention to detail in patient care during the dental implants process was very helpful.
Highly recommended.

Place is cozy, sometimes may have a few customers waiting. Dr Fung and Dr Florence are both very friendly, gentle and considerate. Service is fast and professional. Have been here for annual scaling and polishing for the past few years.
